thread.section_title: Houzz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Houzz | www.houzz.com
thread.title: tmiles330

author: tmiles330
title: tmiles330
text: I'm a new user, but so far I am enjoying my experience! I don't have a natural talent for decorating so I love that I can get advice and answers to my questions by professionals. I also like that I can save decorating ideas as well as items I like and organize them by room, etc. I've been overwhelmed about decorating my house but I feel like houzz is really going to help me do this!
